description.zh: Homarr 是一个简洁现代的控制面板，旨在简化对自托管应用和服务的管理。它提供了一个集中式的界面，用于访问和控制服务器上的应用程序，并实现无缝集成。该面板安装简便，支持多种部署方式，包括 Docker、unRAID 和 Synology。
description.en: Homarr is a sleek, modern dashboard designed to simplify the management of self-hosted apps and services. It provides a centralized interface for accessing and controlling server applications with seamless integration. The dashboard is easy to install and supports a wide range of deployment methods including Docker, unRAID, and Synology.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 集中管理自托管应用程序
- 灵活易用的多种部署选项
- 现代化界面，提供增强的用户体验

## 功能列表:

- 支持拖放操作的高度自定义网格系统
- 与主流自托管应用无缝集成
- 无需 YAML 的快速应用管理
- 高级密钥管理系统提升安全性
- 内置应用状态监控系统
- 超过 7000 个图标的全面图标选择器
- 支持通过 Docker、unRAID 和 Synology 快速部署
- 兼容多种硬件平台（x86、树莓派等）
- 内置小部件和集成支持，涵盖 BT 客户端、媒体服务器、DNS 拦截器等
- 支持在网页和集成中快速搜索
- 提供详细文档和活跃的社区支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Centralized control of self-hosted applications
- Easy and flexible deployment options
- Enhanced user experience with a modern, customizable interface

## Features:

- Highly customizable drag and drop grid system
- Seamless integration with popular self-hosted apps
- Easy and fast app management without YAML
- Advanced secrets management for security
- Built-in status monitoring system
- Comprehensive icon picker with over 7000 icons
- Easy deployment via Docker, unRAID, and Synology
- Compatibility with various hardware platforms (x86, Raspberry Pi, etc.)
- Built-in widgets and integrations for torrent clients, media servers, DNS blockers, and more
- Instant search functionality across web and integrations
- Detailed documentation and active community support
